plot: Jeff is awoken in the middle of the night to his brother pounding on his apartment door. The body of his lifeless girlfriend clutched in his arms, he claims they were attacked by a werewolf.
title: Bad Moon Rising
plot_es: Jeff is awoken in the middle of the night to his brother pounding on his apartment door. The body of his lifeless girlfriend clutched in his arms, he claims they were attacked by a werewolf.
plot_en: Jeff is awoken in the middle of the night to his brother pounding on his apartment door. The body of his lifeless girlfriend clutched in his arms, he claims they were attacked by a werewolf.
